name: Last Resort (Kenyy, Sam Lee, Wei Yin, Khairil Azmyr, Crystal Poon, Tanosh)
name_original: Last Resort (Kenyy, Sam Lee, Wei Yin, Khairil Azmyr, Crystal Poon, Tanosh)
description:
Last Resort is a reverse horror hack and slash game where you play as a monster who is held captive in a lab. You don't have the heart to kill but due to how you were born, you require blood to survive. One day, you decide to break free after hearing about a multiverse machine that has finished developing, it is capable of transferring your consciousness to another universe. So, as a last resort, you decide to break free to find a universe where you no longer need violence to survive.

_________________________        ___________________________

Last Resort was developed by NoLife, a group of passionate student developers from UOWMKDU. The team consists of:

  • Sam Lee Chong Wei
    • Lead Programmer
  • Kenny Yeow Kai Jie
    • Lead Designer
  • Chuan Wei Yin
    • Lead Artist
  • Poon Hui Hua
    • Artist
  • Khairil Azmyr Bin Azizan
    • Programmer
  • Tanessh Khumar
    • Programmer

BGM Credit:
Joel Corelitz: Dark, Silent Mist, Emergency, City Night, Playful, Relax

Made for a Game Jam within 48 hours.
